title: What are the features of standalone 5G? - Quora

response.answer_text: E2E network is built using 5G equipment (both radio and core network equipment)Standalone 5G supports “Network Slicing” capabilities - to partition the wireless network across multiple customers / use-casesStandalone 5G allows service providers to use the unlicensed spectrum (5 GHz) for 5G services.The core network in a Standalone 5G network uses virtualised network functions (VNFs)And of course, Standalone 5G would support higher speeds and lower latencies.
response.upvotes: Answer requested by Ravi Kiran JP
